title.$t: MyFantasyLeague.com Site News

description.$t:
The following stat changes were made by the Elias Sports Bureau, and are now available to be applied to your league on MyFantasyLeague.com:

Miami Dolphins at Indianapolis Colts

  • Laiatu Latu: from 2 to 6 Interception Return Yards.

Tampa Bay Buccaneers at Atlanta Falcons

  • Lavonte David: from 1 to 0 Quarterback Hits.
  • Antoine Winfield: from 0 to 1 Quarterback Hits.
  • Jessie Bates: from 4 to 5 Assists.
  • Billy Bowman: from 3 to 2 Tackles.
  • Billy Bowman: from 3 to 4 Assists.

Carolina Panthers at Jacksonville Jaguars

  • Foyesade Oluokun: from 6 to 5 Tackles.
  • Foyesade Oluokun: from 4 to 5 Assists.
  • Andrew Wingard: from 4 to 3 Tackles.
  • Andrew Wingard: from 4 to 6 Assists.
  • Khalen Saunders: from 1 to 2 Assists.

Las Vegas Raiders at New England Patriots

  • Jeremy Chinn: from 0 to 1 Assists.
  • Jonah Laulu: from 2 to 1 Tackles.
  • Jonah Laulu: from 0 to 1 Assists.
  • Craig Woodson: from 2 to 3 Assists.
  • Milton Williams: from 3 to 2 Assists.
  • K'Lavon Chaisson: from 3 to 2 Assists.
  • Joshua Farmer: from 0 to 1 Assists.

Arizona Cardinals at New Orleans Saints

  • Jalen Thompson: from 0 to 1 Passes Defended.
  • Zaven Collins: from 2 to 3 Assists.
  • Baron Browning: from 2 to 3 Assists.
  • Josh Sweat: from 1 to 0 Tackles.
  • Josh Sweat: from 0 to 1 Assists.
  • Jordan Burch: from 1 to 0 Tackles.
  • Jordan Burch: from 0 to 1 Assists.

Pittsburgh Steelers at New York Jets

  • Juan Thornhill: from 4 to 5 Assists.
  • Jermaine Johnson: from 2 to 3 Assists.
  • Jowon Briggs: from 2 to 1 Assists.

New York Giants at Washington Commanders

  • Frankie Luvu: from 2 to 1 Tackles.
  • Frankie Luvu: from 5 to 6 Assists.
  • Da'Ron Payne: from 2 to 3 Assists.
  • Dorance Armstrong: from 3 to 4 Tackles.
  • Deatrich Wise: from 2 to 1 Assists.
  • Javon Kinlaw: from 3 to 2 Assists.
  • Marshon Lattimore: from 1 to 2 Passes Defended.

Tennessee Titans at Denver Broncos

  • Cody Barton: from 0 to 1 Tackles For A Loss.
  • Kevin Zeitler: from 0 to 1 Miscellaneous Tackles.
  • Talanoa Hufanga: from 3 to 4 Assists.
  • Brandon Jones: from 3 to 2 Tackles.
  • Brandon Jones: from 4 to 5 Assists.
  • Zach Allen: from 3 to 5 Quarterback Hits.

San Francisco 49ers at Seattle Seahawks

  • Renardo Green: from 1 to 2 Passes Defended.

Detroit Lions at Green Bay Packers

  • Jack Campbell: from 4 to 5 Assists.
  • Alex Anzalone: from 2 to 1 Tackles.
  • Alex Anzalone: from 2 to 3 Assists.

Baltimore Ravens at Buffalo Bills

  • Ed Oliver: from 1 to 2 Quarterback Hits.

title.$t: Week 1 Official Statistics Changes - Stat Changes for Week #1
Week 1 Strange Plays - Strange Plays for Week #1

description.$t:
Each week, we'll summarize some of the more unusual plays so you can make sure your rules are handling them properly. We'll cover Special Teams and Defensive scores, as well as Blocks and Safeties.

  • Harrison Butker (KCC) missed an Extra Point.
  • Chase McLaughlin (TBB) missed an Extra Point.
  • Andre Szmyt (CLE) missed an Extra Point.
  • Tua Tagovailoa (MIA) threw a 2pt Conversion to Julian Hill.
  • Chad Ryland (ARI) Had a 46 yard Field Goal attempt Blocked by Bryan Bresee (NOS) .
  • Jake Moody (SFO) Had a 36 yard Field Goal attempt Blocked by Julian Love (SEA) .
  • Tyler Loop (BAL) missed an Extra Point.
  • J.J. McCarthy (MIN) threw an Interception and Nahshon Wright (CHI) Returned it 74 yards for a TD.
  • J.J. McCarthy (MIN) threw a 2pt Conversion to Adam Thielen.

title.$t: MFL Tip - Draft Day Preparation

description.$t:
Get ready to dominate your league this season with our top-notch tools and expert advice! Here's how you can prepare like a pro:

  1. Player Rankings: Access our free Fantasy Sharks Rankings or enhance your strategy with premium projections from FantasyGuru, RotoWire, 4for4, RotoBallers, FantasyLife, and ProFootballFocus. Premium options start at just $0.95 per week. Check them out here!
  2. Latest ADP Rankings: Stay ahead of the game by reviewing our Average Draft Position (ADP) Rankings, updated daily to reflect the latest trends and help you gauge when to draft players. Explore ADP here!
  3. Free Draft Advice: Get free draft tips with the Fantasy Sharks Draft Guide!
  4. Advanced Draft Advice: For a more detailed strategy, try our Draft Hero tool. It helps you target specific positions and players for each pick, syncing seamlessly with your league. Discover Draft Hero here!
  5. Auction League Insights: Latest AAV: In an auction league? Use our Average Auction Values (AAV) to optimize your budget and avoid overpaying for players. View AAV here!
  6. IDP League Support: IDP Rankings: Get top-tier IDP rankings from Gary Davenport, a leading expert in the field, integrated directly into your MyFantasyLeague.com leagues. Learn more about our IDP Rankings here!
With these resources at your disposal, you're set for an outstanding fantasy season!

For full details and instructions on how to Draft or Auction for your league be sure to review the Help Center - Owner Tutorials

Best of luck,
The MyFantasyLeague.com Team

The preseason is heating up, and every snap matters for building your championship roster. Week 2 is where depth charts shift, rookies earn (or lose) playing time, and breakout players start to emerge.

We have teamed up with our trusted content partners to bring you a few relevant and actionable fantasy football advice this week:

Featured Articles & Insights

  • 4for4: Preseason Week 1 Recap - 13 Must-Know Facts
  • 4for4:Can Saquon still dominate? - Saquon Barkley Remains in the Perfect Situation With the Eagles
  • Fantasy Life: Running Back Tiers - Bijan Robinson Leads the Way
  • Fantasy Life: Auction Fantasy Football Draft Strategy - notable risers and fallers in auction draft value

Want more fantasy advice from 4for4? Use promo code "MFL" to get 25% off at https://4for4.com/plans

Heads up! Our Guillotine Leagues have a new name: Chop Leagues.

Many of your Guillotine Leagues have been on MFL since 2019, which was when we became the first platform to support the Guillotine League format. You will be happy to know that all the commissioner features, elimination rules, waiver wire bidding, and fun you know and love remain exactly the same. You can keep enjoying your chop league on MFL -- and the Monday night panic -- without missing a beat.

Same rules. Same drama. Same weekly cuts. Just a new name to keep the fun going. Let the chopping begin!

Quick Fantasy Tip for the Week: Don't overreact to one big preseason play?but do pay attention to snap counts and how early a player enters the game. Opportunity often matters more than highlight reels. Need more than one opinion or set of rankings? We have you covered with Premium Player Projections from the best in the business loaded directly into your leagues on MFL.

title.$t: MFL Tip - Chop Leagues and Preseason Prep

description.$t:
Heads up -- our Guillotine Leagues have a new name: Chop Leagues.

We wanted you to be the first to know about the new name coming this weekend. Many of your guillotine leagues have been on MFL since 2019, which was when we became the first platform to support the guillotine league format.

All the commissioner features, elimination rules, waiver wire bidding, and fun you know and love remain exactly the same. You can keep enjoying your league on MFL -- and the Monday night panic -- without missing a beat.

Same rules. Same drama. Same weekly cuts. Just a new name to keep the fun going.

Let the chopping begin!

title.$t: MFL Tip - Guillotine Leagues are now Chop Leagues

description.$t:
Our Draft Hero is the ultimate tool to give you personalized draft advice to optimize every pick for your drafts here on MyFantasyLeague.com as well as on other platforms you play on such as CBS, ESPN, Yahoo, NFFC, FFPC and many more. Check out this video to see how you can sync Draft Hero with a live draft on MFL for immediate pick-by-pick advice.

Learn more about Draft Hero here: https://home.myfantasyleague.com/drafthero

Or go directly to Draft Hero to sign up for free to get started.

Our early bird discount deadline is almost here! If you haven't already purchased your league(s) for 2025, be sure to do so by Friday, August 1st to take advantage of the $10 early bird discount on standard commissioner leagues.

title.$t: MFL Tip - Check out Rotowire.com!

description.$t:
RotoWire: New Look. Smarter Tools. Same Trusted Edge.

This week, RotoWire unveiled a new and enhanced experience -- a fresh look, faster website, upgraded fantasy football tools and completely modernized app.

  • RotoWire Football Draft Kit App -- now with more tools like the game-changing Draft Plan feature, Mock Draft Simulator, cheat sheets and even more coming later this month
  • A redesigned, mobile-first website
  • Real-time player news across all sports -- still the fastest in the game
  • Smarter projections powered by data science and expert insight

RotoWire pioneered fantasy coverage. Now they've rebuilt the experience to help you win even more.

Save 15% on any subscription with code: MFL

Elevate Your 2025 Fantasy Football Experience with MyFantasyLeague.com!

We're thrilled to offer an industry first and game-changing update for your 2025 fantasy football season. MyFantasyLeague.com now offers integrated player projections and rankings from multiple elite sources integrated and viewable in all your leagues!

New Player Projections and Rankings Options:

  • Rotowire Projections
  • 4for4 Projections
  • Pro Football Focus Projections
  • Rotoballer Projections
  • FantasyGuru Projections
  • Fantasy Life Projections
  • FTN Projections
  • IDP Rankings by Gary Davenport
  • Dynasty League Football (DLF) Rankings
  • FantasySharks Dynasty Rankings

What's in it for you? You will continue to enjoy our popular player projections and rankings from FantasySharks.com. Now, you also have the option to enhance your draft and in-season strategy with projections and rankings from the industry's top experts. These additional sources can be purchased and seamlessly integrated into your league, allowing you to view them on existing projections and rankings screens, lineup submissions, and waiver moves.

Maximize Your Winning Potential! Take your fantasy team(s) to the next level with our new premium player stats projections and rankings. Click here for more details and make this your best fantasy football season yet!
